mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (BANK_ID, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, ADDRESS_ID) VALUES (#{bankId}, #{fullName}, #{birthDate}, #{addressId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, BANK_ID, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, ADDRESS_ID FROM customer
SELECT c.ID, c.BANK_ID, c.FULL_NAME, c.BIRTH_DATE, c.ADDRESS_ID FROM customer c JOIN address a ON c.ADDRESS_ID = a.ID WHERE a.CITY = #{city}
